title: Game crashes and freezes computer as soon game starts
body: So my friend has been having this problem since the update. I checked all his drivers and they were all updated and ok. But as soon as he launches a game his League instantly freezes and crashes his computer. He's forced to restart his computer and try to join again but only crashes. Any help?

replies.body:
This issue has been pretty prevalent with players running Windows 10 that have recently installed the anniversary updates. A feature called *game dvr* was enabled inside the Windows Game Bar. To ensure this app isn't causing your friend's issues, I recommend [disabling it entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if this helped your friend out.
